input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Taylor Stitch"
Reference Product Name: "The Democratic Chino"
Reference Product Description:
Originally issued to American soldiers during WWII, the first military chinos were celebrated for their comfort, versatility, and impressive ruggedness. They proved so popular, in fact, that soldiers held onto their well-worn pairs even after discharge, and as more and more civilians took notice, the style became a fixture of garages and workshops as well as college campuses and city streets all across the country. Featuring 100% Responsible materials and an updated silhouette, The Foundation Pant is both a reinvention of our earlier chinos and an elevated reimagining of the all-purpose originals, built to help you start your day on solid ground. Because it's been garment dyed and washed, it has the character of a well-loved vintage piece, and it'll continue to pick up a ton of nuance with wear. Cool herringbone accents at the waistband and the pockets serve as a nod to the style's military origins. SPECIFICATIONS Classic medium rise, tailored fit, straight through the thigh with a slight taper from knee to leg opening. Available in 32" inseam. 8-oz. 100% organic cotton. 5-oz. 100% organic cotton herringbone pocketing. Garment dyed and washed for a vintage feel. Front slash pockets allow easy entry into pockets. Low-profile welt coin pocket inset at waistband. Two back welt pockets. 4-hole vintage military style button at waistband. YKK zipper fly. Bound fly and outseam. Wash cold and tumble dry low. Made in China. Model is 6'1", wearing a 32.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Dockers Men's Alpha Straight Fit Chino'
  - Name='Dockers Men's Classic Fit Easy Khaki Pants'
  - Name='Banana Republic Khaki Solid Chino Pants'
  - Name='Men's Slim Summerweight Chino'
  - Name='Men's Slim Lived-In Chino'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Linen Easy Pant'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Mid Rise Zip Up Straight Leg Pants'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Performance Chino Uniform Pants'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Ludlow Slim-Fit Japanese Cotton Suit Pant'
  - Name='Rhone Commuter Pull-On Pants'
  - Name='Rhone Classic Commuter Pants'
  - Name='Ministry of Supply Men's Velocity Dress Pant'
  - Name='Rhone Quantum Pant'
  - Name='Bonobos Friday Straight Fit Casual Chinos'
  - Name='Dockers Men's Easy Slim Fit Khaki Stretch Pants'
  - Name='Dockers Men's Classic Fit Workday Khaki Smart 360 Flex Pants'
  - Name='Bonobos Men's Washed Stretch Cotton Chino Pants'
  - Name='Dockers Men's Straight Fit Perfect Chino Pant'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Relaxed Canvas Pants'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Transit Chino Shorts'
  - Name='NWT Everlane Men's The Performance Chino Pants'
  - Name='Everlane Uniform Men's The Performance Chino Slim Fit Pant'
  - Name='Everlane Men's The Performance Chino Uniform Slim Fit Pants'
  - Name='Bonobos Weekday Chino Pants'
  - Name='Dockers Men's Relaxed Tapered Chinos'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Dockers Men's Alpha Straight Fit Chino
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Both are men's chinos with tailored and straight fit, focusing on similar silhouette and function as versatile pants.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Dockers Men's Classic Fit Easy Khaki Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic fit chinos for men with a focus on comfort and traditional style, closely related to the reference's chino pants.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Khaki Solid Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's chino pants with a similar classic, versatile style and silhouette, targeting the same category as the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Slim Summerweight Chino
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit chinos designed for warmer weather but still aligning with the chino style and intended use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Slim Lived-In Chino
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit chinos emphasizing a lived-in feel, matching the referenceâ€™s vintage garment washed look and chino focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Linen Easy Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pants made of linen for ease, differing in material and likely heavier focus on casual comfort rather than chino style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Mid Rise Zip Up Straight Leg Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Mid rise straight leg pants generally align with the chino silhouette but lack specific chino identification.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Performance Chino Uniform Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance chinos specifically mentioned, very close in type, function, and likely silhouette to the reference chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Ludlow Slim-Fit Japanese Cotton Suit Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Suit pants differ in fabric and formality though also slim fit, less casual and rugged than chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Commuter Pull-On Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pull-on pants focus on comfort and ease, less structured than traditional chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Classic Commuter Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic commuter pants likely in a similar casual pant category but may differ in details and specific chino features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ministry of Supply Men's Velocity Dress Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Dress pants differ significantly in function, materials, and formality from rugged chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Quantum Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely athletic or performance pant diverging from traditional chino style and heritage.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bonobos Friday Straight Fit Casual Chinos
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Casual straight fit chinos matching close to the reference in silhouette and intended casual use.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit khaki pants with stretch feature, close to chinos but adding stretch fabric changes.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Washed stretch cotton chinos closely align with the reference's garment dyed, comfortable chino style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Dockers Men's Straight Fit Perfect Chino Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Straight fit chinos very similar in construction and style to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Relaxed Canvas Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Relaxed canvas pants differ in fit and heavier cotton canvas fabric from the tailored, mid-weight chino cotton.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Chino shorts share material and style origins but differ in length and use case so less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Dockers Men's Relaxed Tapered Chinos
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Relaxed tapered chinos remain within the chino family with a different fit silhouette but similar purpose and style.
